title: @Meddler I had literally purchased a rune page right before this bundle sale went on.
body: @Meddler , I have literally purchased a rune page right before the rune page bundle came out. Is there some possible way players could have a bit more advanced warning inside the launcher about these deals so that we don't mistakenly waste IP?

replies.body: Yeah, this is definitely our bad.  We intended to have more trumpets blaring from the outside of the 2 for 1 rune page sale, but there was a mix-up in when these news articles went live.  They are live now, and if you missed out the 2 for 1 sale without knowing it, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We should be able to help you out and get this resolved :)
